issues.title: Conduct infrastructure documentation review and workshop with Westpac stakeholders
issues.body: Review the current infrastructure documentation and hold a workshop with Westpac stakeholders to gather requirements.

issues.title: Define project goals and create draft project plan
issues.body: Collaboratively define goals and draft the initial project plan based on stakeholder input.

issues.title: Finalise and align project plan with Westpac Stakeholders
issues.body: Get final approval from Westpac stakeholders and align the project plan with their requirements.

issues.title: Conduct risk assessment documentation review and workshop
issues.body: Review existing risk assessment documents and hold a workshop to align with Westpac's security strategy.

issues.title: Develop GitHub security best practices document
issues.body: Create a best practices document for GitHub security aligned with Westpac's policy.

issues.title: Document SBOM and validate security strategy
issues.body: Document Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) and validate the security strategy recommendations.

issues.title: Review organisation and team structure requirements
issues.body: Review and document the requirements for the GitHub Enterprise Cloud organisation and team structure.

issues.title: Provide solution options for team structure and repository management
issues.body: Recommend options for managing the team structure and repositories in GitHub Enterprise Cloud.

issues.title: Provide guidance for network configuration
issues.body: Ensure that the network configuration for GitHub Enterprise Cloud is properly set up.

issues.title: Provide guidance for allowlist and proxy connections
issues.body: Help configure allowlist and proxy connections for secure GitHub access.

issues.title: Confirm MFA and SSO approach
issues.body: Confirm the multi-factor authentication and single sign-on strategy.

issues.title: Integrate EntraID and create API for group management
issues.body: Integrate EntraID and create APIs to manage user groups.

issues.title: Finalise identity management setup
issues.body: Complete the identity management setup, including IACU integration.

issues.title: Develop GitHub Actions rollout strategy
issues.body: Plan and execute the strategy for GitHub Actions rollout.

issues.title: Set up on-premises GitHub runners
issues.body: Install and configure on-premises GitHub runners.

issues.title: Configure Azure Kubernetes runners
issues.body: Configure runners in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for GitHub Actions.

issues.title: Review implementation requirements for automatic environment enforcement
issues.body: Determine requirements for automatically enforcing environment configurations.

issues.title: Set up automated provisioning of environment settings
issues.body: Provide solutions for automating environment provisioning.

issues.title: Implement peer review requirements for production commits
issues.body: Enforce peer review for commits to the production environment.

issues.title: Review provisioning and enforcement policies
issues.body: Ensure that the provisioning and enforcement policies are effective.

issues.title: Establish monitoring practices
issues.body: Set up monitoring systems to track the performance of DevOps processes.

issues.title: Create DevOps best practices guide
issues.body: Document best practices for DevOps in the GitHub Enterprise Cloud environment.

issues.title: Conduct final assessment and review
issues.body: Perform the final review of all project components and ensure everything is in order.

issues.title: Complete handover and future support planning
issues.body: Prepare the final handover documents and plan for future support and maintenance.
